content: p2 k2 p1 to end of round round 3 k2 p2 k1 ssk to end of round round 4 k2 p2 k2 to end of round round 5 k2 p2tog k2 to end of round round 6 k2 p1 k2 to end of round round 7 k2 p1 k1 k2tog k1 to 3 sts from end of round p1 k1 slip next st to rn and remove m place the stitch back onto left needle k2tog k1 place marker again this will be your new beginning of the round round 8 p1 k3 to end of round round 9 p1 ssk k1 to end of round round 10 p1 k2 to end of round round 11 k2tog k1 to end of round 5 we d love it if you share this project on instagram #atwistedaffair for pattern support you can contact me at designsbyjoji@gmail com www jojiknits com 6
